name: Drop Pop
description:
Drop and place orbs in order to link four or more in a row. Strategically place orbs in order to chain combos together and maximize your score! Tap locations on the board to place exploding bombs if things get too hectic. Enjoy the frenetically paced puzzle game designed for all ages!

Controls

arrow keys to move

a - rotate counter-clockwise

s - rotate clockwise

p - pause
